Field Detail

app

protected EuclideFrame app
the parent application.

name

protected java.lang.String name
the name of the tool. This is the label used to find it in a hashtable in the main application.

step

protected int step
Each tool consists in a series of actions. This variable keep the current state of evolution of the tool.

instructions

private java.lang.String[] instructions
The Tool instruction corresponding to each step. Each step should correspond to one instruction line.

EuclideTool

public EuclideTool(EuclideFrame app,

Method Detail

getInstruction

public java.lang.String getInstruction()
Give instruction corresponding to current step of the tool.

Returns:
an instruction string for this tool

setInstructions

public void setInstructions(java.lang.String[] strings)
set up the instruction strings for the tool. The number of strings should be equal to the number of possible step for the tool.

Parameters:
strings -

select

public void select()
This function is called when the tool is selected. Overload this method to add initialization.

deselect

public void deselect()
This function is called when the tool is deselected. Overload this method to add post processing to the tool.
